title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async, streaming, PyPI package.

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter giving Ollama LLM & embeddings nodes with one line.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; docker run in 30 s.

title: ollama4j – Java client
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb – Ruby gem
summary: Ruby wrapper for Ollama with native streaming and Rails integrations.

title: ollama-cli – Rust CLI
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot – VS Code extension
summary: Bring local Ollama models into VS Code inline chat & sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU nodes.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (cuda, rocm, cpu) with multi-arch support.

title: ollama-rag – Retrieval plugin
summary: Plug-and-play RAG server that augments any Ollama model with local ChromaDB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host a Discord bot powered by any Ollama model in 5 minutes.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local LLMs into channels/DMs with streaming replies.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI that talks to Ollama; deploy with one click on Streamlit Cloud.

title: ollama-napi – Node-API binding
summary: High-performance Node.js native addon for batch inference with Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp – .NET SDK
summary: Community-maintained C# client targeting .NET 6+ with async enumerables.

title: ollama-dart – Flutter package
summary: Dart client for Flutter/Desktop apps; pub.dev package with code-gen.

title: ollama-ex – Elixir client
summary: Lightweight Elixir library that wraps Ollama in GenServer processes.

title: awesome-ollama
summary: Curated list of tools, integrations, tutorials and model mods for Ollama.
